titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for preventing the plundring, spoyling, or robbing of any His Majesties subjects, and for restraining of stragling and idle people from following the army, as likewise for supplying His Majesties army with necessary provisions during their march
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford, this seventeenth day of March, in the eighteenth yeare of our raigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
